verbose_text: Excessive inflammatory responses, including leukocyte exudation, edema, tissue necrosis and increased release of inflammatory cytokines (IL-6 and TNF-alpha), are hallmarks of MIRI, which can activate the cytokine cascade, and promote the production of oxygen free radicals to activate neutrophils and induce the apoptosis of cardiomyocytes.
evidence: MIRI, which can activate the cytokine cascade, and promote the production of oxygen free radicals to activate neutrophils and induce the apoptosis
